title: mana dAhattai
sahitya:
mana dAhattai mATri aruLvAi vAnamudat-tEnaiyAn arundat-tandE


anupallavi

  ghanamAna mAyak-kAnalai virumbEn kATSiyAga ninadu karuNai vENDuginrEn


caraNam    sattiya jnAnamum sAdhu sngamum cancalam illAda nenjagat-teLivum
shuddha sanmArgattin siddhiyum muttiyum turiya vaLa nATTin ariya vAzhvum Inden
